text: Hi <@U01DW9WUYDB>, unless you are using a drag and drop email editor, I believe that you should be able to try to add <https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_rwd_mediaqueries.asp|media queries> to the head HTML of your email template.
Thank you for the advice! Solved it differently - used the image from the drag and drop and left the module contain only the text. ^^
